org.magicdgs.readtools.cmd.plugin

Class TrimmerPluginDescriptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.broadinstitute.barclay.argparser.CommandLinePluginDescriptor<TrimmingFunction>
      • org.magicdgs.readtools.cmd.plugin.TrimmerPluginDescriptor

  • public final class TrimmerPluginDescriptor
extends org.broadinstitute.barclay.argparser.CommandLinePluginDescriptor<TrimmingFunction>
    Plugin descriptor for including trimmers in the command line as TrimmingFunction.

        @Argument(fullName="trimmer",
          shortName="TM",
          doc="Trimmers to be applied. Note: default trimmers are applied first and then the rest of them in order.",
          optional=true)
public final java.util.List<java.lang.String> userTrimmerNames

          doc="Default trimmers to be disabled.",
          optional=true,
          mutex="disableAllDefaultTrimmers")

      • disableAllDefaultTrimmers

        @Argument(fullName="disableAllDefaultTrimmers",
          shortName="disableAllDefaultTrimmers",
          doc="Disable all default trimmers. It may be useful to reorder the trimmers.",
          optional=true,
          mutex="disableTrimmer")
public boolean disableAllDefaultTrimmers

      • disable5pTrim

        @Argument(fullName="disable5pTrim",
          shortName="D5PT",
          doc="Disable 5\'-trimming. May be useful for downstream mark of duplicate reads, usually identified by the 5\' mapping position. Cannot be true when argument disable3pTrim(D3PT) is true.",
          optional=true)
public boolean disable5pTrim

      • disable3pTrim

        @Argument(fullName="disable3pTrim",
          shortName="D3PT",
          doc="Disable 3\'-trimming. Cannot be true when argument disable5pTrim(D5PT) is true.",
          optional=true)
public boolean disable3pTrim

      • getDefaultInstances

        public java.util.List<java.lang.Object> getDefaultInstances()
        Gets all the default instances provided; if disabling all the default instances is specified, returns an empty list. Note: only the enabled trimmers will be returned.
        Specified by:
        getDefaultInstances in class org.broadinstitute.barclay.argparser.CommandLinePluginDescriptor<TrimmingFunction>

      • getAllInstances

        public java.util.List<TrimmingFunction> getAllInstances()
        Gets all the instances provided by the user. It may return an empty list if the user does not specify any tool or only the default ones (without disable then completely). Note: if all default trimmers are disable, this list include all the command line ones; otherwise, the defaults will be excluded.
        Specified by:
        getAllInstances in class org.broadinstitute.barclay.argparser.CommandLinePluginDescriptor<TrimmingFunction>
